name: Plant (DAE Studios)
description:
Try not to get squashed or drown and survive longer then the other plants. Fight it out in this everchanging arena to be the last one standing.

“A goofy 2-4 player PvP game”

  • Everchanging Tetris like environment
  • Unique plants with abilities
  • Squash, kick, stun, ... 
  • Chaotic fast paced split screen gameplay

Plant team:

  • Martijn Dhondt
  • Kiran Aneca
  • Robine De Roeck
  • Ioana Serban
